data: PED BIOCHEM Hyperhomocysteinemia (Module)
Status
This powerplan is related to hyperhomocysteinemia due to Cysthationine B-Synthase (CBS), Methylenetetrahydrofolate Reductase (MTHFR) Deficiency, Intracellular Cobalamin Metabolism Disorders
Dehydration greatly increases chance of thromboembolic events.
Diet/Nutrition
Communication Order
RN to notify Biochemical Genetics dietitian that patient is on the ward
Biochemical Genetics Protein Modified Diet
T;N
Biochemical Genetics Protein Modified Recipe-Based Formula
Formula Room to Prepare, Hominex-1 68kcal/100mL, Hominex-1 powder 79 grams, + water to Final Vol (mL) 560, 8 x 70mL bottles, PO
Formula Room to Prepare, Hominex-1 powder grams, PO
Formula Room to Prepare, Hominex-2 powder grams, PO
